meanings.definition: The speed of an aircraft relative to the air.
meanings.sent1: The pilot adjusted the airspeeds to maintain a smooth flight.
meanings.sent2: The airspeeds of the plane were crucial for a safe landing.
meanings.sent3: The airspeeds of the tiny toy plane made it the fastest in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the airspeeds of a soaring eagle.
meanings.sent5: The airspeeds of the jet were so fast that it felt like flying through a dream.

meanings.definition: The rate at which an aircraft moves through the air.
meanings.sent1: Pilots must constantly monitor the airspeeds during flight.
meanings.sent2: The airspeeds of the aircraft were affected by the strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The airspeeds of the paper airplane amazed the children as it flew across the room.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed through the meeting room at the airspeeds of a supersonic jet.
meanings.sent5: The airspeeds of the fighter jet were so rapid that it left a trail of excitement in the sky.
